message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this valuable product from me. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a competitive price, considering the product's worth to you is $1500000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's worth to me is $1500000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1000000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1100000. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to you is $1500000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1500000.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make a slightly more aggressive counteroffer of $1050000. This is still a competitive price considering the product's worth to you is $1500000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

I appreciate your aggressive counteroffer, but I'm still not willing to pay $1050000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1500000.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to my previous offer and propose a price of $1025000. This is still a competitive price considering the product's worth to you is $1500000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

I appreciate your willingness to make adjustments, but I'm still not willing to pay $1025000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $875000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1500000.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $875000. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to my previous offer and propose a price of $1050000. This is still a competitive price considering the product's worth to you is $1500000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I've reached my limit for negotiations. I'm willing to meet you at $975000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
